projects.name: pgm-art
projects.description:
A web application for a local artist done in Django and deployed with Digital Ocean, bootstrap 4 used for styling.
 It features a CRUD and admin interface for the user to manage her projects and different information.
projects.features: CRUD, admin interface, support for vimeo and youtube video insertion, responsive design

projects.name: lebonpot
projects.description: A web application for a local store, developped in Wordpress
projects.features: Wordpress, Woocommerce, responsive design, payments with stripe, account creation, email notifications, invoice generation

workExperience.description:
During my time in Movatec i performed different functions mostly in the Back End sector of their HaddaCloud service.
 these functions include:
tasks: Creation of an automatic email notification system in Django
Optimization of existing code by utilizing DRY and SOLID principles
Creation of a new service for the company's clients via Vue.js and NestJs
Migration of a PentahoETL process to ApacheSpark
Creation of ETL diagrams for the company's clients
workExperience.techStack: Django, Vue.js, Vuetify, DigitalOcean, MySQL, MongoSQL, PostgreSQL, ApacheSpark, BitBucket, Linux, PentahoETL
